name: Lekaki
content:
Lekaki was a male Ximpi that lived during the High Republic Era. Around 232 BBY, Lekaki encountered fellow Ximpi Kanrii and Jedi Padawan Keeve Trennis at the Needles, a formation of tall rocks, on the planet Shuraden, while Trennis was undergoing her Jedi Trials. When a swarm of Ridadi, a species of star-locusts, appeared shortly thereafter, Lekaki was eaten by one of the Ridadi. Kanrii begged Tennis to save him, but the Padawan answered that Lekaki was dead and nothing could be done.
Lekaki had blue skin, black hair, and black eyes. Lekaki had two white wings behind his back and wore brown pants.
Lekaki appeared in the comic The High Republic  1, published by Marvel Comics on January 6, 2021. The comic was written by Cavan Scott and illustrated by Ario Anindito and Annalisa Leoni.
